actions.name: AddBridgeOutputs
actions.description: Grants permission to add outputs to an existing bridge

actions.name: AddBridgeSources
actions.description: Grants permission to add sources to an existing bridge

actions.name: AddFlowMediaStreams
actions.description: Grants permission to add media streams to any flow

actions.name: AddFlowOutputs
actions.description: Grants permission to add outputs to any flow

actions.name: AddFlowSources
actions.description: Grants permission to add sources to any flow

actions.name: AddFlowVpcInterfaces
actions.description: Grants permission to add VPC interfaces to any flow

actions.name: CreateBridge
actions.description: Grants permission to create bridges

actions.name: CreateFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to create flows

actions.name: CreateGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to create gateways

actions.name: DeleteBridge
actions.description: Grants permission to delete bridges

actions.name: DeleteFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to delete flows

actions.name: DeleteGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to delete gateways

actions.name: DeregisterGatewayInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to deregister gateway instance

actions.name: DescribeBridge
actions.description: Grants permission to display the details of a bridge

actions.name: DescribeFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to display the details of a flow including the flow ARN, name, and Availability Zone, as well as details about the source, outputs, and entitlements

actions.name: DescribeGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to display the details of a gateway including the gateway ARN, name, and CIDR blocks, as well as details about the networks

actions.name: DescribeGatewayInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to display the details of a gateway instance

actions.name: DescribeOffering
actions.description: Grants permission to display the details of an offering

actions.name: DescribeReservation
actions.description: Grants permission to display the details of a reservation

actions.name: DiscoverGatewayPollEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to discover gateway poll endpoint

actions.name: GrantFlowEntitlements
actions.description: Grants permission to grant entitlements on any flow

actions.name: ListBridges
actions.description: Grants permission to display a list of bridges that are associated with this account and an optionally specified Arn

actions.name: ListEntitlements
actions.description: Grants permission to display a list of all entitlements that have been granted to the account

actions.name: ListFlows
actions.description: Grants permission to display a list of flows that are associated with this account

actions.name: ListGatewayInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to display a list of instances that are associated with this gateway

actions.name: ListGateways
actions.description: Grants permission to display a list of gateways that are associated with this account

actions.name: ListOfferings
actions.description: Grants permission to display a list of all offerings that are available to the account in the current AWS Region

actions.name: ListReservations
actions.description: Grants permission to display a list of all reservations that have been purchased by the account in the current AWS Region

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to display a list of all tags associated with a resource

actions.name: PollGateway
actions.description: Grants permission to poll gateway

actions.name: PurchaseOffering
actions.description: Grants permission to purchase an offering

actions.name: RemoveBridgeOutput
actions.description: Grants permission to remove an output of an existing bridge

actions.name: RemoveBridgeSource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a source of an existing bridge

actions.name: RemoveFlowMediaStream
actions.description: Grants permission to remove media streams from any flow

actions.name: RemoveFlowOutput
actions.description: Grants permission to remove outputs from any flow

actions.name: RemoveFlowSource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove sources from any flow

actions.name: RemoveFlowVpcInterface
actions.description: Grants permission to remove VPC interfaces from any flow

actions.name: RevokeFlowEntitlement
actions.description: Grants permission to revoke entitlements on any flow

actions.name: StartFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to start flows

actions.name: StopFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to stop flows

actions.name: SubmitGatewayStateChange
actions.description: Grants permission to submit gateway state change

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to associate tags with resources

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from resources

actions.name: UpdateBridge
actions.description: Grants permission to update bridges

actions.name: UpdateBridgeOutput
actions.description: Grants permission to update an output of an existing bridge

actions.name: UpdateBridgeSource
actions.description: Grants permission to update a source of an existing bridge

actions.name: UpdateBridgeState
actions.description: Grants permission to update the state of an existing bridge

actions.name: UpdateFlow
actions.description: Grants permission to update flows

actions.name: UpdateFlowEntitlement
actions.description: Grants permission to update entitlements on any flow

actions.name: UpdateFlowMediaStream
actions.description: Grants permission to update media streams on any flow

actions.name: UpdateFlowOutput
actions.description: Grants permission to update outputs on any flow

actions.name: UpdateFlowSource
actions.description: Grants permission to update the source of any flow
